languages.text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."
languages.original_text: "Я слышу биение его сердца... рокот крови в жилах... пульсацию страха в черной душе..."

traits.locale_text: "Я слышу биение его сердца... рокот крови в жилах... пульсацию страха в черной душе..."
"I can hear the beat of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

"I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

languages.text: "Я слышу биение его сердца... рокот крови в жилах... пульсацию страха в черной душе..."
« Je sens les battements de son cœur... le sang qui rugit dans ses veines... la peur qui émane de son âme d'un noir abyssal... »
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: « Je sens les battements de son cœur... le sang qui rugit dans ses veines... la peur qui émane de son âme d'un noir abyssal... »

languages.text: 「心臓の鼓動が聞こえる…血管の中で轟く血潮が…黒い魂に脈打つ恐怖が…」
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: 「心臓の鼓動が聞こえる…血管の中で轟く血潮が…黒い魂に脈打つ恐怖が…」

languages.text: “我听到了他的心跳……听到了他血管中沸腾的血液……听到了他那黑色灵魂里跳动的恐惧……”
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: “我听到了他的心跳……听到了他血管中沸腾的血液……听到了他那黑色灵魂里跳动的恐惧……”

languages.text: "Ich kann sein Herz schlagen hören ... das Blut durch seine Venen rauschen ... die Furcht in seiner schwarzen Seele pochen ..."
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann sein Herz schlagen hören ... das Blut durch seine Venen rauschen ... die Furcht in seiner schwarzen Seele pochen ..."

languages.text: «Oigo el latido de su corazón... la sangre que bulle en sus venas... el palpitante miedo de su negra alma...».
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: «Oigo el latido de su corazón... la sangre que bulle en sus venas... el palpitante miedo de su negra alma...».

languages.text: "Kalp atışlarını duyabiliyorum. Damarlarında hızla akan kanı, kara ruhunda nabız gibi atan korkuyu..."
languages.original_text: "I can hear the beating of his heart... the roaring blood in his veins... the pulsating fear in his black soul..."

traits.locale_text: "Kalp atışlarını duyabiliyorum. Damarlarında hızla akan kanı, kara ruhunda nabız gibi atan korkuyu..."
